  • Method Details

    • getAllReaders

      @GetMapping("/readers/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getAllReaders()
      Retrieves all users with the role of USER, and their corresponding profiles.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a list of ModelProfile objects, and a success message.

    • getReaderById

      @GetMapping("/readers/uuid/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getReaderById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a user with the given id, and their corresponding profile.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a ModelUser object, and a success message.

    • getReaderByUsernameOrEmail

      @GetMapping("/readers/usem/{value}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getReaderByUsernameOrEmail(@PathVariable("value") String value)
      Retrieves a user with the given username or email.
      Parameters:
      value - The username or email of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a ModelUser object, and a success message.

    • createReader

      @Transactional @PostMapping("/readers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> createReader(@RequestBody ReaderRequest user)
      Creates a new user and profile with the given information. Sends a welcome email to the user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user information to create a new user and profile.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a ModelUser object, and a success message.

    • updateReader

      @Transactional @PutMapping("/readers/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> updateReader(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody ReaderRequest reader)
      Update a reader's information.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the reader to update.
      reader - The new information for the reader.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing an ApiResponse with the result of the update.

    • partialUpdateReader

      @Transactional @PatchMapping("/readers/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> partialUpdateReader(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody ReaderRequest reader)
      Partially updates a reader's information.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the reader to update.
      reader - The updated information of the reader.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a ModelProfile object, and a success message.

    • deleteReader

      @Transactional @DeleteMapping("/readers/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> deleteReader(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Deletes a reader with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the reader to delete.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a message, and a success message.

    • sendNotification

      @Transactional @PostMapping("/notifications/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> sendNotification(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody NotificationRequest request)
      Sends a notification to a user.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user to send the notification to
      request - The notification request containing the content of the notification
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing an ApiResponse with the result of the notification sending

    • getNotificationByUser

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a list of notifications, and a success message.

    • getAllbooks

      @GetMapping("/books/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getAllbooks()
      Retrieves all books from the database.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a list of books, and a success message.

    • getTopNBooks

      @GetMapping("/books/top/{n}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getTopNBooks(@PathVariable int n)
      Retrieves the top N books from the database.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of books to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a list of books, and a success message.

    • getBookById

      @GetMapping("/books/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getBookById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a book by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a book, and a success message.

    • updateBook

      @Transactional @PutMapping("/books/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> updateBook(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody BookRequest request)
      Updates a book with the given id using the data in the request.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book to update
      request - the data to update the book with
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing an ApiResponse with the result of the update

    • deleteBook

      @Transactional @DeleteMapping("/books/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> deleteBook(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Deletes a book with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing an ApiResponse with the result of the delete operation

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a list of loans, and a success message.

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the loan.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, the loan, and a success message.

    • createLoan

      @Transactional @PostMapping("/loans") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> createLoan(@RequestBody LoanRequest request)

    • returnLoan

      @Transactional @PutMapping("/loans/{id}/return") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> returnLoan(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody LoanRequest request)
      Updates a loan by returning it.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the loan to be returned.
      request - The request containing the return date.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the updated loan.

    • deleteLoan

      @Transactional @DeleteMapping("/loans/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> deleteLoan(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Deletes a loan by its id. If the loan is not returned yet, it will increase the number of copies of the related book.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the loan to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the result of the deletion.

    • getReservationsByUser

      @GetMapping("/reservations/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getReservationsByUser(@PathVariable("userId") Long id)
      Retrieves all reservations of a user.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, a list of reservations, and a success message.

    • getReservationsById

      @GetMapping("/reservations/read/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getReservationsById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a reservation by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the reservation.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, the reservation, and a success message.

    • createReservation

      @Transactional @PostMapping("/reservations") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> createReservation(@RequestBody ReservationRequest request)

    • reservationStatus

      @Transactional @PutMapping("/reservations/{id}/status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> reservationStatus(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody ReservationRequest request)
      Updates the status of a reservation and sends a confirmation email if the status is updated successfully.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the reservation to update.
      request - The request object containing the new status.
      Returns:
      The response entity containing the updated reservation and a success message if the update is successful, otherwise an error message.

    • deleteReservation

      @Transactional @DeleteMapping("/reservations/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> deleteReservation(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Deletes a reservation by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the reservation to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a ApiResponse with a status code, the ID of the deleted reservation, and a success/error message.
